body_html: @AnesBenmerzoug Oh I see now, thanks for the clarification. I wonder if you can find a way to make it done in one model, because I am very interested in implementing other versions of SVRG. I am curious on how would your two model work for the VITE algorithm in algorithm 2 in this paper?
body_text: @AnesBenmerzoug Oh I see now, thanks for the clarification. I wonder if you can find a way to make it done in one model, because I am very interested in implementing other versions of SVRG. I am curious on how would your two model work for the VITE algorithm in algorithm 2 in this paper?
body: @AnesBenmerzoug Oh I see now, thanks for the clarification. I wonder if you can find a way to make it done in one model, because I am very interested in implementing other versions of SVRG. I am curious on how would your two model work for the VITE algorithm in algorithm 2 in this [paper](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1503.08316.pdf)?
